docsTags.name: virtualProp
docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.

docsTags.name: part
docsTags.text: progress - The progress bar that shows the current value when `type` is `"determinate"` and slides back and forth when `type` is `"indeterminate"`.

docsTags.name: part
docsTags.text: stream - The animated circles that appear while buffering. This only shows when `buffer` is set and `type` is `"determinate"`.

docsTags.name: part
docsTags.text:
track - The track bar behind the progress bar. If the `buffer` property is set and `type` is `"determinate"` the track will be the
width of the `buffer` value.

props.name: buffer
props.docs:
If the buffer and value are smaller than 1, the buffer circles will show.
The buffer should be between [0, 1].

props.name: color
props.docs:
The color to use from your application's color palette.
Default options are: `"primary"`, `"secondary"`, `"tertiary"`, `"success"`, `"warning"`, `"danger"`, `"light"`, `"medium"`, and `"dark"`.
For more information on colors, see [theming](/docs/theming/basics).

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

props.name: reversed
props.docs: If true, reverse the progress bar direction.

props.name: type
props.docs:
The state of the progress bar, based on if the time the process takes is known or not.
Default options are: `"determinate"` (no animation), `"indeterminate"` (animate from left to right).

props.name: value
props.docs:
The value determines how much of the active bar should display when the
`type` is `"determinate"`.
The value should be between [0, 1].

styles.name: --background
styles.docs: Background of the progress track, or the buffer bar if `buffer` is set

styles.name: --progress-background
styles.docs: Background of the progress bar representing the current value

parts.name: progress
parts.docs: The progress bar that shows the current value when `type` is `"determinate"` and slides back and forth when `type` is `"indeterminate"`.

parts.name: stream
parts.docs: The animated circles that appear while buffering. This only shows when `buffer` is set and `type` is `"determinate"`.

parts.name: track
parts.docs:
The track bar behind the progress bar. If the `buffer` property is set and `type` is `"determinate"` the track will be the
width of the `buffer` value.
